data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will only work on Windows platforms, because the
    Microsoft Agent itself is only available on those. So Win32 is a
    logical choice. The Microsoft Agent is referred to in all microsoft
    documentation as the MSAgent or Agent. Because Agent is a term that
    can be used for other things, MSAgent would be a logical choice.
    Hence Win32::MSAgent.
